dublinCore.dc:title: HR 3957 ENR: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 218–10 Merrick Boulevard in Springfield Gardens, New York, as the “Cynthia Jenkins Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Friday, the third day of January, two thousand and fourteen
form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 218–10 Merrick Boulevard in Springfield Gardens, New York, as the Cynthia Jenkins Post Office Building.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 218–10 Merrick Boulevard in Springfield Gardens, New York, shall be known and designated as the Cynthia Jenkins Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Cynthia Jenkins Post Office Building.

attestation-group.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
